name: For My Own Good
author: Millem
content: The only way out is through.In the midst of a disastrous monster attack fated to end the world, a strange device throws Heejae back in time 20 years where he meets the students of his foster father, Seokyoung. Now it&#039s up to him to take them under his wing and stop the apocalypse so he can finally set off for a peaceful life.
